content: of the FILELIST panel by pressing F12. f. Populate SYSTEM DTCPARMS U with the contents from SSLPOOL DTCTEMP A: i. Move your cursor to the SYSTEM DTCPARMS U1 line and press F11 to open the file in XEDIT. ii. Delete all lines in the current file: ====> delete 10 DMSXCG501I 7 line(s) deleted DMSXSU559W Warning: file is empty 00001 * * * End of File * * * iii. Import the contents of SSLPOOL DTCTEMP A and then move to the top of the file and save your changes so far: ====> get SSLPOOL DTCTEMP A ====> top ====> save iv. Modify the header so that it reflects the file name, purpose, and last person to modify the file, as shown in Example 6-31. Example 6-31 Modified header * ================================================================= * SYSTEM DTCPARMS : TCPMAINT 198 -- MOD 2020-09-19 PWNOVAK * Created by: SSLPOOL EXEC -- 18 April 2015 - 18:41:15 * ================================================================= v. Filter by lines that contain an asterisk (*): ====> all/* vi.
